summary: [Taxpayer] appeals the assessment of use tax and/or deferred sales tax, plus penalties and interest, resulting from sales reclassified from wholesaling to government contracting where Taxpayer received resale certificates or reseller permits from prime contractors, and where Taxpayer did not understand its tax liability as a government contractor.  Taxpayer’s petition is denied in part but remanded for possible adjustment based on additional documents provided on appeal. [Taxpayer’s petition is denied in part and remanded in part.]
